name: Simple Omelette
steps: Crack 2-3 eggs into a bowl and whisk well with a pinch of salt and pepper.
Heat a non-stick pan and add a small knob of butter.
Pour the eggs into the pan and let them set for a minute.
Fold the omelette in half once the bottom is cooked and serve immediately.

name: Pasta Primavera
steps: Boil your favorite pasta according to the package instructions.
Sauté a mix of seasonal vegetables (like bell peppers, zucchini, and cherry tomatoes) in olive oil.
Toss the cooked pasta with the sautéed vegetables and a splash of lemon juice.
Season with salt, pepper, and fresh basil before serving.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked and slice into strips.
Toss mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onions in a bowl.
Top the salad with the grilled chicken and drizzle with your favorite dressing.

name: Beef Wellington
steps: Sear a beef tenderloin on all sides until browned.
Prepare a mushroom duxelles and spread it over the seared beef.
Wrap the beef in puff pastry, sealing the edges well.
Bake in a preheated oven until the pastry is golden and the beef is cooked to your liking.
Let rest briefly before slicing and serving.

name: Chocolate Cake
steps: Preheat the oven and prepare a cake pan by greasing it lightly.
Mix flour, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, and butter until smooth.
Pour the batter into the pan and bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Allow the cake to cool and optionally frost with chocolate ganache before serving.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large pan over high heat.
Add minced garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add vegetables, starting with the ones that take longer to cook (like carrots and broccoli).
Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Add soy sauce and a dash of sesame oil, toss to combine and serve hot.

name: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast the bread until golden and crispy.
Mash the ripe avocado with a fork and spread it on the toast.
Sprinkle with salt, red pepper flakes, and a squeeze of lemon juice.
For extra protein, top with a poached egg (optional).

name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: Sauté sliced mushrooms and diced onion in butter until soft.
Add beef strips and cook until browned on all sides.
Sprinkle with flour and stir, then add beef broth gradually.
Simmer until the sauce thickens, then stir in sour cream.
Serve over cooked egg noodles with a sprinkle of fresh parsley.

name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
In a large pan, sauté minced garlic in olive oil and butter until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Stir in lemon juice, lemon zest, and red pepper flakes.
Toss the cooked pasta with the shrimp mixture, adding some pasta water if needed.
Garnish with chopped parsley and grated Parmesan before serving.

name: Microwave Mac and Cheese
steps: Place 1 cup of pasta and 1 cup of water in a large microwave-safe bowl.
Microwave on high for 2-3 minutes, then stir and continue microwaving in 1-minute intervals until pasta is tender (about 4-5 minutes total).
Drain any excess water if necessary.
Stir in 1/4 cup milk, 1 cup shredded cheese, and a small pat of butter if using.
Microwave for another 30 seconds, stir until smooth, and enjoy!

name: Ramen Noodle Upgrade
steps: Boil water according to ramen package instructions.
Add the ramen noodles to the boiling water.
Add a handful of frozen vegetables to the pot.
When the noodles are almost done, crack an egg into the pot and stir gently.
Add the seasoning packet, chopped green onions, and a dash of hot sauce if desired.
Remove from heat and enjoy from the pot or transfer to a bowl.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Toast
steps: Toast the bread to your preferred level of crispiness.
Spread a generous layer of peanut butter on the warm toast.
Slice a banana and arrange the slices on top of the peanut butter.
Drizzle with honey and sprinkle with cinnamon if desired.
For a quick breakfast or snack, you can fold it in half like a sandwich for eating on the go.
